Key Match Events: Trey Sweeney hit a home run in the 3rd inning
Kody Carpenter singled to center, Jung scored, Greene to second in the 3rd inning
Sweeney singled to left, Torkelson scored, McKinstry to second in the 4th inning
Gelof singled to right, Langeliers scored, Brown to third in the 6th inning
Meadows doubled to center, Sweeney scored and Torkelson scored in the 8th inning
Vierling doubled to center, Meadows scored in the 8th inning
Greene singled to right, Vierling scored, Greene to second in the 8th inning
Carpenter doubled to left, Greene scored in the 8th inning
Keith singled to left, Carpenter scored on error, Keith safe at second on fielding error by left fielder Brown in the 8th inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Oakland Coliseum
The game lasted for 3 hours and 6 minutes
